name: from-scratch-app
description: Clock From Scratch is a simple web app that gives you the time of day. I wrote this project to learn more about web development tools. This project uses the following tools: - NPM for package management - Webpack for bundling - Jest for testing - ESLint for linting - Babel for javascript compatibility - Autoprefixer for CSS compatibility

scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm install); (cd server && npm install)
scripts.test: (cd client && npm test); (cd server && npm test)
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"

author: Joshua Chin
